questions.question: I am not angry ________________ anything I feel a little surprised.
questions.explanation: If can be used before non-assertive words like any, anything, ever and not.

questions.question: The Kaziranga National Park is a World Heritage Site ________________ hosts two-thirds of the one-horned rhinoceros in the world.
questions.explanation: A and B can be possible answer.

questions.question: August 31st is a national holiday ________________ everybody dances in the streets.
questions.explanation: When indicates time; where indicates place. That cannot be used instead of when or where.

questions.question: We will get there ________________ you do.
Strange ________________ it may sound, I don't like watching cricket.
questions.explanation: After an adjective or an adverb, as and though can be used in a special structure.

questions.question:
Select the conjunction in the following sentence. 
Camels may bite or spit at their owners.

Supply the correct coordinating conjunction. 
I like science, ________________ I prefer math.

Supply the correct coordinating conjunction. 
We should hurry, ________________ the show is about to begin.
My sister ________________ I do chores after school.
Sarah will ________________ fly in on Monday ________________ drive and arrive on Tuesday.
